install.name: Carousel Banner J1.5
install.author: Rony Sandra Yofa Zebua - Andy Sikumbang
install.description:
Carousel Banner For Joomla 1.5 is work properly for Joomla 1.5 Natively.
This Module will rotate all Joomla banner with a carousel animation

This Module based from Carousel Banner For Joomla 1.0 - Andy Sikumbang and Developted become to Carousel Banner For Joomla 1.5 by Rony Sandra Yofa Zebua (Support Of TemplatePlazza.Com and Member Of Camp26.Com)
Please visit: www.camp26.com and TemplatePlazza.Com

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: banner_cids
param.label: Banner client
param.description: Reference to banner client id. Enter separated by ','!

param.name: banner_limit
param.label: Banner limit
param.description: Limits how many banners will be shown.
